home.title: British Powerlifting
home.subtitle: The National Governing Body for Powerlifting in Great Britain
home.description: British Powerlifting is the National Governing Body for the sport of Powerlifting in Great Britain. We are responsible for the development, promotion, and regulation of Powerlifting throughout England, Scotland, and Wales.

about.title: About British Powerlifting
about.missionText: To promote and develop the sport of Powerlifting throughout Great Britain, ensuring fair competition and supporting athletes at all levels.
about.visionText: To be the leading Powerlifting organization in Great Britain, recognized for excellence, integrity, and athlete development.
about.integrityText: We maintain the highest standards of fairness and ethical conduct.
about.excellenceText: We strive for excellence in all aspects of our organization.
about.inclusivityText: We welcome athletes of all backgrounds and abilities.

membership.title: Membership
membership.description: Join British Powerlifting and become part of our growing community of athletes, coaches, and supporters.

championships.title: Championships
championships.description: British Powerlifting hosts a variety of championships throughout the year for athletes of all levels.

news.title: News & Updates
news.description: Stay up to date with the latest news, announcements, and updates from British Powerlifting.
news.noNews: No news articles available at this time.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with British Powerlifting. We're here to help with any questions or inquiries.
contact.name: Name
